sentences.en: Consensual sexual contact between two males can be a criminal activity.
sentences.cn: 两名男性之间发生的双方自愿的性接触可能会构成犯罪。

sentences.en: Consultation is traditional in the consensual Belgian system of labour relations.
sentences.cn: 协商是建立在意见一致基础上的比利时劳资关系体系的传统做法。

sentences.en: Everyone is under a subtle pressure to consensual reality.
sentences.cn: 面对现实,每个人都能感受到压力.

sentences.en: He acknowledges that sex took place but insists it was consensual.
sentences.cn: 他承认有发生性行为,但坚持是两厢情愿的.

sentences.en: Mr Lafley is, by contrast, affable and consensual in his approach.
sentences.cn: 相反, 雷富礼先生为人和蔼可亲,并采取众人认可的途径.

sentences.en: Mr. Bryant admitted having sex with his accuser but insisted it was consensual.
sentences.cn: 科比承认与原告发生过性关系,但坚持说是两厢情愿的.

sentences.en: Probably the most important attribute of contract isit is a voluntary, consensual relationship.
sentences.cn: 合同最重要的特征可能在于合同是一种自愿合意关系.

sentences.en: SEX, in most species of bird, is a consensual activity.
sentences.cn: 性对于大多数鸟类来说是个两厢情愿的事.

sentences.en: The judge said, in a verdict broadcast live on television, that the two had consensual sex.
sentences.cn: 法官在电视和电台实况转播的宣判中说, 原告和被告两人自愿发生了性关系.

sentences.en: The parts of the law struck down include consensual sex between adults.
sentences.cn: 根据该法律部分内容规定,两厢情愿的性行为也属于犯罪.

words.tran_cn: 同意；（意见等的）一致；赞成

trans.tran_cn: 经双方同意的，一致同意的
trans.tran_en: involving the agreement of all or most people in a group
